text: Yara allahâ€Œra o tamra rasulera birud'dhe yud'dha ghosana kare ara dese gandagola bamdhate tatpara haya tadera ekamatra prapya hacche -- tadera katala karo, athaba sule cara'o, athaba tadera hata o tadera pa biparita dike kete phelo, athaba tadera desa theke nirbasita karo. Eti hacche tadera jan'ya ihaloke lanchana, ara tadera jan'ya parakale rayeche kathora sasti
